response.overview: Marcus and Jayson are avid pot smokers who dream of better lives, but when they find out their old high school teacher wins a huge sum in a lottery they come up with a plan that will change their lives forever.
response.tagline: Marcus and Jayson are avid pot smokers who dream of better lives, but when they find out their old high school teacher wins a huge sum in a lottery they come up with a plan that will change their lives forever.
response.title: Fruitless Blossoms, Part One
